h2_title: How to Find Gold Armored Rhino
h3_title: Gold Armored Rhino Boss Fight and Guide
content: The fight is very much a rinse-and-repeat situation, where you'll just want to try and hit the horn as much as you can to try and break it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gold_Armored_Rhino.md', within the main section titled 'Gold Armored Rhino', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Gold Armored Rhino' and the sub-subsection 'Gold Armored Rhino Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The fight is very much a rinse-and-repeat situation, where you'll just want to try and hit the horn as much as you can to try and break it.
